Uses of Package
co.cask.cdap.api.metrics

  • Packages that use co.cask.cdap.api.metrics 
    Package Description
    co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib
    Collection of Dataset implementations available out-of-the-box in CDAP.
    co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.metrics
    Defines integration points for Datasets and Metrics system.
    co.cask.cdap.api.metrics
    Defines a way to collect user-defined metrics.
    co.cask.cdap.api.spark
    Defines APIs for defining Spark jobs in CDAP.
    co.cask.cdap.etl.api
    Packages for ETL Application Templates.
    co.cask.cdap.test
    This package contains the public classes for unit tests.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.metrics used by co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib 
    Class and Description
    MetricsCollector
    Collects metrics.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.metrics used by co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.metrics 
    Class and Description
    MetricsCollector
    Collects metrics.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.metrics used by co.cask.cdap.api.metrics 
    Class and Description
    MetricDataQuery
    Defines a query to perform on MetricStore data.
    MetricDeleteQuery
    Query that specifies parameters to delete entries from MetricStore.
    MetricsCollector
    Collects metrics.
    MetricsContext
    A context of metrics collection.
    MetricSearchQuery
    Defines a query to perform Exploration and Search on MetricStore data.
    MetricTimeSeries
    Represents a single time series defined by a metric name and set of tag values.
    MetricType
    MetricType - COUNTER or GAUGE type
    MetricValue
    Carries the "raw" emitted metric data point: metric name, type, and value
    MetricValues
    Carries the "raw" emitted metric data points: context, timestamp, collection of MetricValue
    TagValue
    Represents tag and its value associated with MetricValues.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.metrics used by co.cask.cdap.api.spark 
    Class and Description
    Metrics
    Defines a way to collect user-defined metrics.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.metrics used by co.cask.cdap.etl.api 
    Class and Description
    Metrics
    Defines a way to collect user-defined metrics.
  • Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.metrics used by co.cask.cdap.test 
    Class and Description
    MetricDataQuery
    Defines a query to perform on MetricStore data.
    MetricStore
    Stores and provides access to metrics data.
    MetricTimeSeries
    Represents a single time series defined by a metric name and set of tag values.
    RuntimeMetrics
    Provides access to metrics about running processors.
